org.apache.paimon.table.source

Interface StreamTableScan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Restorable<Long>, TableScan
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InnerStreamTableScan
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InnerStreamTableScanImpl

    @Public
public interface StreamTableScan
extends TableScan, Restorable<Long>
    TableScan for streaming, supports checkpoint() and restore(java.lang.Long).

    NOTE: checkpoint() will return the next snapshot id.

    Since:
    0.4.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.paimon.table.source.TableScan
